text: Reminds me of the older Dragon Quest games, and a bit of Golden Sun.
author: Sephiko

text: One of my favorite RPGs for the DS. The battle system is completely average, including the lack of balance in difficulty, but I really liked everything else. It was surprisingly ambitious, with a lot of sidequests, a full world map with different layers, customizable airships you can use in battles (inspired by Skies of Arcadia), bonus dungeons, all that with a big soundtrack. A hidden gem in my book.
author: SupraDarky

text: Wow, really? I was turned away from the game because all I saw of it was its gameplay. I might not play it, though I'll keep those pros in mind...
author: Jirt
